title: Matrix multiplication in softmax documentation carried out incorrectly
body_html:
In the softmax documentation on page:

http://tensorflow.org/tutorials/mnist/beginners/index.md

There is a set of images showing an example of what the function is doing:

Then the "xs" are pulled out so that we have the vectors Wx. But the coefficients in the image above is incorrect. If the image below, also take form the docs, shows the true form then the equations in the above image should be:

y1 = W1,1x1 + W1,2x2 + W1,3x3 + b1

instead of:

y1 = W1,1x1 + W1,2x1 + W1,3x1 + b1
body_text:
In the softmax documentation on page:
http://tensorflow.org/tutorials/mnist/beginners/index.md
There is a set of images showing an example of what the function is doing:

Then the "xs" are pulled out so that we have the vectors Wx. But the coefficients in the image above is incorrect. If the image below, also take form the docs, shows the true form then the equations in the above image should be:
y1 = W1,1x1 + W1,2x2 + W1,3x3 + b1
instead of:
y1 = W1,1x1 + W1,2x1 + W1,3x1 + b1
body:
In the softmax documentation on page:

http://tensorflow.org/tutorials/mnist/beginners/index.md

There is a set of images showing an example of what the function is doing:

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5950006/11081692/e3c5dc3c-87ec-11e5-8e9a-6ed0b0ace7c6.png)

Then the "xs" are pulled out so that we have the vectors Wx. But the coefficients in the image above is incorrect. If the image below, also take form the docs, shows the true form then the equations in the above image should be:

y1 = W1,1**x1** + W1,2**x2** + W1,3**x3** + b1

instead of:

y1 = W1,1**x1** + W1,2**x1** + W1,3**x1** + b1

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5950006/11081715/38e3fdb6-87ed-11e5-8621-ac80926f2c03.png)
